EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-07-29-VMworld Europe Giveaway 2016.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Hey}}, Win Two Tickets to VMworld Europe 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-2016-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmworld-europe-passes-2016&utm_content=07292016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Back by popular demand, VMTurbo is giving 3 lucky winners 2 Full Conference Passes to VMworld Europe 2016 in beautiful Barcelona, Spain! The epicenter of all things virtual, VMworld is our industry's biggest stage and we want to see you there. We are giving away a pair of tickets on August 5th, August 19th and September 9th. Enter today for your chance to win!
<[[http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-2016-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmworld-europe-passes-2016&utm_content=07292016]]> Good Luck! -The VMTurbo Team
